item.title: Trump administration threatens Harvard with foreign student ban
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem accused the institution of "threatening national security".

item.title: Tesla whistleblower wins latest legal battle against Elon Musk
item.description: Engineer Cristina Balan raised a safety concern about a design flaw which could affect the cars' braking in 2014.

item.title: Could this faraway world be home to life?
item.description: Researchers studying planet K2-18b's atmosphere have detected signs of molecules which on Earth are only produced by simple organisms.

item.title: US to hold talks on Ukraine with European allies
item.description: Donald Trump has repeatedly said he wants to broker a swift end to the ongoing conflict.

item.title: Canada party leaders grilled in election debate on how to tackle Trump
item.description: Frontrunner Mark Carney was tested in Wednesday's French-language debate, the first of two match-ups before the 28 April election.
